allow: Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& ''.specify/scripts/powershell/create-new-feature.ps1'' -Json -Number 1 -ShortName ''fastapi-todo-backend'' @\(''specify a FastAPI backend that converts the existing Python CLI Todo application into a RESTful service using SQLModel and NeonDB for persistent storage.
